encryption-key.exported: Exported Encryption Key and copied to clipboard
encryption-key.title: Export Encryption Key

private-key.exported: Exported Private Key and copied to clipboard
private-key.title: Export Private Key

dev-domain.desc: With this configuration the ending ".evan" is replaced by the given address. With this logic it is possible to use applications on different domains simultaneously for test purposes (e.g.: myapp.test.evan).
dev-domain.title: Applications from test-domain

browser.reload-hint: Please reload the application if you have changed the language settings.

identity.description: In the following table, you can add or remove contacts that have access to the current identity. For example, they are authorized to access all data, edit information, share data, or perform transactions.
identity.not-support: You are currently logged in with an old, non-identity-based profile. User management for identities is only supported for current profiles.

grant-access.body: You have been granted "{access}" access to the identity of {alias} ({identity}). Use the link below to save the reference in your profile to interact on behalf of this identity.
grant-access.title: Identity access

remove-access.body: Your access to the identity of {alias} {identity}} has been revoked. Use the following link to delete the reference in your profile.
remove-access.title: Identity access revoked

delete-modal.description: Do you really want to revoke the permissions for this user? The write permissions will be removed and he will receive a request to delete the encryption key for your identity.
delete-modal.title: Remove Permissions

address.error: Please select a contact to grant access to.
address.label: Contact

side-panel.title: Identity permissions
side-panel.select-contact: Select a contact which may manage your identity

empty.filtered: No results found with the current filter.
empty.text: No contacts are yet authorized to interact via your identity.
